text: Ronan Farrow, the son of Mia and Woody Allen, is the Pulitzer - prize winning journalist whose exposé triggered # MeToo. Now, he has written an acclaimed book on waning US diplomatic influence – and he ’ s still only 30 “ Thanks for taking the time, ” says Ronan Farrow when we meet at a central London hotel. Farrow is the journalist whose exposé of Harvey Weinstein helped kickstart the # MeToo movement. Just 30 years old, he looks, up close, about 13. But he has packed into his three decades more adventures and achievements than most of us could manage in two lifetimes. Of course he had a head start. He was the only biological child of two extremely famous people : Woody Allen, arguably America ’ s most celebrated living film - maker
